tasks.task: Planting garlic in a no-dig bed and a hugelkultur bed to compare their performance.
subtasks: Obtain garlic cloves (store-bought and from current harvest).
Identify two garden beds: one no-dig and one hugelkultur.
Prepare the no-dig bed by layering compost and organic materials without digging.
Prepare the hugelkultur bed using decaying wood and organic matter as the core.
Plant garlic cloves at a depth of approximately 4 inches.
Determine whether to water immediately after planting based on soil moisture (waiting in this case due to wet ground).
Cover soil lightly (raking over the planting area).

tasks.task: Compare the performance of the no-dig bed and hugelkultur bed after the growing season.
subtasks: Wait until the garlic harvest to compare the results.
Create a comparison video to share observations.
Share the video on the subscriber channel.
